title: Catalogue, "Exhibition Catalogue for Ex Libris 11: Bauhaus", 1984–85
medium: Lithography in black and white ink on white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
On cover diagonally in 3D letters in white: bauhaus
On back cover at lower left in black: ex libris/ 160A east 70 street new york 10021 (212) 249 2618
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Diagonal 3D letters in white announce the title of the exhibition, while the inside of the catalogue displays text and images relating to 197 items in the exhibition at Elaine Lutig Cohen's gallery, Ex Libris.

tombstone.epitaph:
Catalogue, "Exhibition Catalogue for Ex Libris 11: Bauhaus", 1984–85.
1984–85. Lithography in black and white ink on white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-149.
